description: [Status: stable] [Name: duplicate-union-member] [Message: Duplicate union member {}] What it does Checks for duplicate union members. Why is this bad? Duplicate union members are redundant and should be removed. Example foo: str | str Use instead: foo: str Fix safety This rule's fix is marked as safe unless the union contains comments. For nested union, the fix will flatten type expressions into a single top-level union.
